archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: (h160) 3D ILS Prepa
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
ILS is using DMU and CorePDM: - Data from CorePDM are in the same database as design Office tool - For 3D, the LSA is performed the 3D ILS Prepa Tool. 3D data need to be “cleaned” and LSA selects only data in a certain level of maturity. 3D ILS Prepa tools helps at cleaning the DMU data.
The current process can be described as follows: - Step 1: data cleaning & filtering ; - Step 2: data preparation in MOA Environment by copying data from DOA Environment (this copy/paste is run in the same tool: CorePDM). This duplication of data between DOA and MOA environment may also consists in splitting reference: one P/N from DOA is split into several P/N in MOA (LSA BOM). All the split is done in CorePDM. Maintenance Operations are then linked to the right LSA P/N into CorePDM. - Step 3: from CorePDM data, 3D Data data preparation using 3D ILS Prepa tool ; - Step 4: Maintainability Analysis (O/I and IPC). Once the analysis is run, all LSA data are stored back into the CorePDM. --- This application was specifically developed by DS. It integrates part of the configuration that is extracted from the PLM by a nightly batch. The link with Catia is broken
appli spécifique par DS certaines zones, je veux tel conf extrait en batch la nuit prennent ce qu'ils veulent créent des animations avec Catia composer cassent le lien entre Catia fait dans core pdm => analyse impact lsa dans corepdm personnes du support Pour les autres, c'est manuel
